name: ext_R4_PlanDefinition_relatedArtifact
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.PlanDefinition.relatedArtifact for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.relatedArtifact from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.relatedArtifact` maps to R3 `PlanDefinition.relatedArtifact`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.
